text: <!channel>: any questions/comments for my check-in with the client today?
<!channel>: how's deck creation going? Can I see a draft? I sent out a meeting request for 1-1:30pm tomorrow
<@U02688JHZ>, putting it together right now. currently adding the flow chart/the stuff jason and i jotted on the board/talked about yesterday into it.
cool! Thanks <@U02AUNA0P>  Please share the draft after you've added that
<!channel>: can someone please post the deck?
We can't open the play store if the user presses the nfc button and they don't have the app installed
hey guys - writing from another meeting, but think we need to add a bit to this
specifically page 5 — it's not the detailed description we discussed
<@U0261PCRQ> is right, the phone doesn't care about the NFC button until the app is installed
ok - so <@U02F9CXTL> and <@U02AUNA0P>  - notes about NFC/App relationship
need to change that around
and page 5 - we need to get broader: Artist > Type (clock, slideshow, etc) > specific (clock 1, 2, 3)
since they mentioned it in the meeting, it's probably also worth adding that users will have to have their nfc enabled for the button press to work.
<@U0265G76F>: Phillip is working on the detail version still
Right. <@U0261PCRQ>
like the bluetooth or WiFi check
<@U0261PCRQ>: do you have a couple min to chat with phillip and i?
sure thing
this is apparently who originally worked on Goldmember: <https://rehabstudio.com/>

attachments.title: +rehabstudio - A creative technology company
attachments.text: This is Hand built digital. rehabstudio is a creative & technology company that blend creativity & innovative technology, with expert craftsmanship (and whiskey). Based in Belfast, London & New York, we work on digital advertising, branding and communications projects with agencies and clients all over the globe. Our teams live our process of Hand Built Digital®. When it's applied to digital production, we have the ability to craft experiences that people want to talk about, share and engage with.

text: they're an Aarra company
my friend Myke is their head of production
so everyone knows, I was wrong before and apparently we can open the play store with the nfc button. who knew?
How's the code look?
Trying to get the background on rehabs involvement.
Code looks ok so far, haven't had a bunch of time to dig in
